flags.title: Unpublished
flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
So far only have basic idea and design for this solution is here. Now, everyones help is needed in order to make this concept a reality.

When finished and partners have teamed up, this will be a contribution to the Oil Cleanup X Challenge - with a chance of winning 1 million dollars.

guide.summary: An oil cleanup solution, open for anyone to make better.
guide.title: Oil Cleanup solution
